title: OCD Mantra : OCD treatment App
description: The leading app for OCD treatment through online therapy by qualified OCD therapists. Have obsessive thoughts? Facing repeated, persistent, and unwanted urges? Something worrying you? At OCDMantra you’ll find the help you need and deserve. ------------------------------------------- ⭐OCD MANTRA – FEATURES ------------------------------------------- ✔Over 1,000 OCD OCD therapists ✔ Match with an available counselor who is the best fit for your needs ✔Unlimited private one on one communication with your therapist ✔Free OCD test 📌AFFORDABLE COUNSELING At OCDMantra, we think that counseling services should be driven by need rather than the ability to pay. Our online sessions are 90% less expensive than face-to-face therapy. Our online therapy plans start from $15/week. We offer higher flexibility and much more affordable prices. 📌YOUR THERAPY, YOUR TERMS Psychological support can be crucial at any point of your day. Our therapists are available 24/7 for online counseling via messages or video calls to provide care, whenever and wherever you need it. You won’t need to worry about scheduling a session or commuting. 📌LICENSED AND TRAINED OCD THERAPISTS OCD Mantra therapists include licensed counselors, psychologists, and social workers, and they all are trained in exposure and response prevention, or ERP, the most effective OCD treatment. 📌FREE SELF CARE TOOLS We offer a vast array of free self-help tools such as OCD control exercises, OCD tests, relaxation techniques, mindfulness exercises, and helpful blogs. We also offer Free OCD videos, OCD chat groups, OCD community, and more, available 24/7. 📌HOW IT WORKS After filling out our questionnaire, you will be matched with an OCD counselor based on your needs and preferences. You and your counselor will get your own secure and private “therapy room” where you can message or video call your counselor at any time wherever you are. You can write or talk about yourself and discuss the challenges you’re facing and your counselor will provide feedback, insights, and guidance. 📌HOW CAN OCD MANTRA HELP? - Live video sessions with an OCD Therapist - Match with an OCD therapist - Personalize your treatment plan - Do “face-to-face” ERP therapy online through live video sessions - Use OCD therapeutic tools 24/7 including OCD Assessment - Learn what helps other people from a peer OCD community 🏅About OCDMantra: OCDMantra is a part of Mantra Care, a global mental and physical wellbeing provider. Named one of the Most Innovative Companies, our team includes passionate individuals from ISB, Wharton, and Mckinsey. Email us: contact@mantracare.org
descriptionHTML:
The leading app for OCD treatment through online therapy by qualified OCD therapists.
Have obsessive thoughts? Facing repeated, persistent, and unwanted urges? Something worrying you? At OCDMantra you’ll find the help you need and deserve.
-------------------------------------------
⭐OCD MANTRA – FEATURES
-------------------------------------------
✔Over 1,000 OCD OCD therapists
✔ Match with an available counselor who is the best fit for your needs
✔Unlimited private one on one communication with your therapist
✔Free OCD test

📌AFFORDABLE COUNSELING
At OCDMantra, we think that counseling services should be driven by need rather than the ability to pay. Our online sessions are 90% less expensive than face-to-face therapy. Our online therapy plans start from $15/week. We offer higher flexibility and much more affordable prices.

📌YOUR THERAPY, YOUR TERMS
Psychological support can be crucial at any point of your day. Our therapists are available 24/7 for online counseling via messages or video calls to provide care, whenever and wherever you need it. You won’t need to worry about scheduling a session or commuting.

📌LICENSED AND TRAINED OCD THERAPISTS
OCD Mantra therapists include licensed counselors, psychologists, and social workers, and they all are trained in exposure and response prevention, or ERP, the most effective OCD treatment.

📌FREE SELF CARE TOOLS
We offer a vast array of free self-help tools such as OCD control exercises, OCD tests, relaxation techniques, mindfulness exercises, and helpful blogs. We also offer Free OCD videos, OCD chat groups, OCD community, and more, available 24/7.

📌HOW IT WORKS
After filling out our questionnaire, you will be matched with an OCD counselor based on your needs and preferences. You and your counselor will get your own secure and private “therapy room” where you can message or video call your counselor at any time wherever you are.
You can write or talk about yourself and discuss the challenges you’re facing and your counselor will provide feedback, insights, and guidance.

📌HOW CAN OCD MANTRA HELP?
- Live video sessions with an OCD Therapist
- Match with an OCD therapist
- Personalize your treatment plan
- Do “face-to-face” ERP therapy online through live video sessions
- Use OCD therapeutic tools 24/7 including OCD Assessment
- Learn what helps other people from a peer OCD community

🏅About OCDMantra:
OCDMantra is a part of Mantra Care, a global mental and physical wellbeing provider. Named one of the Most Innovative Companies, our team includes passionate individuals from ISB, Wharton, and Mckinsey.

Email us: contact@mantracare.org
summary: Obsessive compulsive disorder app with ERP, OCD test, exercises & therapists
